alert.note: Alert for Kiowa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 6:33PM MDT until May 01 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 633 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chivington, or 20 miles north of Lamar, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sheridan Lake, Chivington, Brandon, Neeoshe Reservoir, Neegronda Reservoir and Queens Reservoir. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This thunderstorm is capable of producing all types of severe weather including extremely large hail, destructive straight line winds and tornadoes. Move quickly to a safe shelter such as an interior room, a bathroom, closet or basement.
